ch.vocal

Class MainApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • ch.vocal.MainApp

  • public class MainApp
extends javafx.application.Application
    The header package contains only the main class MainApp.

    In this class you find the main launch, the start for the stage and main handling methods.

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Constructor
        Specified by:

      • initRootPane

        public void initRootPane()
        Initializes the root layout. Then load the vocabulary file, if possible.

      • showVocabularyOverview

        public void showVocabularyOverview()
        Shows the vocabulary overview inside the root layout.

      • learnMain

        public void learnMain()
        Opens a dialog to enter a new Word in the vocabulary. If the user clicks Eingabe, the changes are saved into the vocabulary and true is returned. If the window is closed without Word, no new Word is stored and false is returned.

      • showInputWordDialog

        public boolean showInputWordDialog(LearnWord newWord)
        Opens a dialog for learning the defined words in the vocabulary. When all learning words are made, a message apprears and the dialog is closed.
        Parameters:
        newWord - the new Word, which may be added.
        Returns:
        true if the user clicked Eingabe, false otherwise.

      • getPrimaryStage

        public javafx.stage.Stage getPrimaryStage()
        Returns the main stage.
        Returns:
        stage object to return the primary stage reference

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • getVocabularyFilePath

        public java.io.File getVocabularyFilePath()
        Returns the vocabulary file preference, i.e. the file that was last opened. The preference is read from the OS specific registry. If no such preference can be found, null is returned. Tested: only for Win7 at 20 May 2018
        Returns:
        File path of the XML file stored in the regedit of Windows

      • setVocabularyFilePath

        public void setVocabularyFilePath(java.io.File file)
        Sets the file path of the currently loaded file. The path is persisted in the OS specific registry.
        Parameters:
        file - the file or null to remove the path

      • loadVocabularyFromFile

        public void loadVocabularyFromFile(java.io.File file)
        Loads vocabulary from the specified file. The current vocabulary will be replaced.
        Parameters:
        file - Filename of the XML File to load

      • saveVocabularyToFile

        public void saveVocabularyToFile(java.io.File file)
        Saves the current vocabulary to the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - Filename for the XML File to save

      • setMaxId

        public void setMaxId(int maxnr)
        Set the maxid to the defined id Number. It should be the highest number in vocabulary.
        Parameters:
        maxnr - highest id number as Integer to set

      • getMaxId

        public int getMaxId()
        Get the highest id number from vocabulary word.
        Returns:
        the highest id number as Integer

      • SetLearnLevel

        public void SetLearnLevel(int learnlevel)
        Set the Words of the defined Level in Status Learn and randomize the ranking for questioning.
        Parameters:
        learnlevel - 0-5 as Integer to set

      • CancelLearnMain

        public static void CancelLearnMain()
        Cancelling the learning mode. It is called by Rootlayout Set back all learing Words.
